typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id_odsp as string,
		id_event as string,
		sort_order as string,
		time as string,
		text as string,
		event_type as string,
		event_type2 as string,
		side as string,
		event_team as string,
		opponent as string,
		player as string,
		player2 as string,
		player_in as string,
		player_out as string,
		shot_place as string,
		shot_outcome as string,
		is_goal as string,
		location as string,
		bodypart as string,
		assist_method as string,
		situation as string,
		fast_break as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EventData
EventData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sinkEventData
